DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate whether electroacupuncture effect pain threshold subject , compare sham treatment .
DOC.detailed_description: This study utilized evaluate effectiveness electroacupuncture pain threshold compare sham . The outcome measurement utilized digital algometer . The electroacupuncture treatment consist total four electroacupuncture treatment stimulate acupuncture point LI4 LI11 , give upper extremity test algometer . The algometer measurement occur alone first week , prior treatment second third week , final reading alone fourth week .
DOC.criteria: Normal healthy subject Hypertension Heart Disease Pregnancy No spinal manipulation treatment medication could effect pain threshold
